content: this cute little pumpkin will bring a lot of joy it can be a great project for crochet beginners it is an easy crochet pattern that works up quick make this little pumpkin in a few hours it can be great present or a nice fall decor this crochet pattern is written in english us terms and includes video links to help you make your own little pumpkin ⚡️size of finished toy about 0 98 2 cm height and 1 77 inches 4 5 cm long with semicotton yarn and a 1 75 mm crochet hook ⚡️⚡️you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough to achieve a tight gauge that will not allow the stuffing to show through the fabric difficulty easy for this pattern you need to have basic crochet and amigurumi skills and to know how to read crochet patterns you need to know the following crochet terms chain chain uk=chain magic_ring magic_ring uk=magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet uk=double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch uk=slip_stitch increase increase in single_crochet uk=increase in double_crochet decrease decrease in single_crochet uk=decrease in double_crochet fo fasten_off uk=fasten_off supplies - 1 75 mm crochet hook - yarn yarnart jeans green color 69 orange color 70 - scissors stitch marker or scrap piece of yarn - soft stuffing - yarn needle
